Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe holds immense value for you. This exceptional item is priced at $1,150,000, reflecting its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations, providing unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. Please consider this offer carefully, and let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,150,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,150,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
